clip.quote: I'm not trying to handle objections over the phone. I just want to get in front of them in person.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical approach to converting FSBOs.
clip.suggested_hook: Struggling with FSBOs? Here's a strategy that works.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Struggling with FSBOs? Here's a strategy that works!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Mark Plesha, a real estate expert who cracked the code on converting FSBOs. Why should you care? Because this tactic can boost your success rate.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Mark shares, 'I'm not trying to handle objections over the phone. I just want to get in front of them in person.' This approach shifts the dynamic, making it easier to build trust and rapport.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By focusing on face-to-face meetings, you can better address concerns and showcase your value. Apply this tactic to enhance your conversion strategy.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to try this out? Schedule your next FSBO meeting in person and see the difference. Share your experiences in the comments!"
  },
  "caption": "Struggling with FSBOs? Try meeting in person to boost conversions. #RealEstateTips",
```

clip.quote: Let the market dictate your actions. Pivot to where the opportunity is.
clip.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to be adaptable and proactive.
clip.suggested_hook: Is your real estate strategy stuck? Learn to pivot effectively.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Is your real estate strategy stuck? Learn to pivot effectively!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Mark Plesha, a real estate expert who believes adaptability is key. Are you ready to let the market guide your next move?",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Mark shares, 'Let the market dictate your actions. Pivot to where the opportunity is.' This mindset shift can transform how you approach challenges and seize new opportunities.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By staying flexible and proactive, you can align your strategies with market trends, ensuring you're always ahead of the curve.",
```
